alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 20 at 8:49PM MST until December 21 at 10:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility occasionally down to one-quarter mile or less. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest New Mexico. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
